sk1.name: Curse of the Silent
sk1.desc: Curses the target area, causing enemy Heroes to take damage and lose mana until they cast a spell.

sk2.name: Glaives of Wisdom
sk2.desc:
Silencer enchants his glaives with his wisdom, dealing additional damage based on his Intelligence. 

Glaives of Wisdom is a Unique Attack Modifier, and does not stack with other Unique Attack Modifiers.

sk3.name: Last Word
sk3.desc: Enchants a target damaging and silencing them if they cast a spell. If the enchantment expires the target will be disarmed in addition to being damaged and silenced.

sk4.name: Global Silence
sk4.desc:
Silencer stops all sound, preventing enemy heroes and units on the map from casting spells.

Upgradable by Aghanim's Scepter.
